subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Belichick-Mangini feud, real as it remains, lives on primarily between the lines, and in the case of the principals and their well-trained players, mostly very bland lines.
snippet: The Belichick-Mangini feud, real as it remains, lives on primarily between the lines, and in the case of the principals and their well-trained players, mostly very bland lines.
